name: customizable-shortcuts
author: Tim Taubert <tim@timtaubert.de>
description: Enables customization and overriding of several default shortcuts.

preferences.name: overridePluginFocus
preferences.title: Steal focus from plug-ins?
preferences.description: When this is on, plugins such as flash will be told to release mouse focus immediately after they have been clicked on.

preferences.name: pluginCssSelectors
preferences.title: List of CSS Selectors by which to find plugins
preferences.description: This list will define which plugins the extension will try to override as described above.

preferences.name: domainUrlPattern
preferences.title: Address Pattern
preferences.description: This pattern will be used to define which sites we will try to prevent focus capturing on. You can use * as wildcards or provide a (case-sensitive) Regular Expression.
